Text: I don't get it.  Why are these archive issues upped one at a time.  Why not a package all at once.
Thanks, curious as to why these archive issues are being released one at a time.  Wouldn't a package of issues be easier?
(And THAT is the reason you wait a moment or two for the original post to appear! LOL)
(This is what happens when you don't wait a moment or two for your comment to appear.)

they're new high-resolution scans, and DobisP.R. is releasing a few each week, and blackcanary posts them as DobisP.R. releases them.

if you look at blackcanary's uploads, you'll see that she does package scans as a set when it's appropriate. (spider-man chapter one, legion of super-heroes, etc.)

Synthesist, like STFmaryville said, I upload them as DobisP.R. releases them.  I'll usually upload a pack that either covers an entire run, a story arc, or something appropriate.  Hope you're enjoying these. :)
